body_html: Do we always build and test on the same machine? It could happen if the test one has better specs than the build one. We should probably dispatch the function chosen among the ones we compiled, not all capabilities. You could start the impl search from the compile capability (instead of the highest one)
body_text: Do we always build and test on the same machine? It could happen if the test one has better specs than the build one. We should probably dispatch the function chosen among the ones we compiled, not all capabilities. You could start the impl search from the compile capability (instead of the highest one)
body: Do we always build and test on the same machine? It could happen if the test one has better specs than the build one. We should probably dispatch the function chosen among the ones we compiled, not all capabilities. You could start the impl search from the compile capability (instead of the highest one)
